2661707 Alberta Ltd: - Depletion is calculated on costs in the Property and Equipment Account at the end of each period
- Costs transferred to the Property and Equipment Account in the period represents annual transfer of Regulatory Costs, G&G Costs and Land and Lease costs transferred at a rate of 20% per year

- The Depletion Calculation uses the total production for at the end of the period and the Total Proved plus Probable Reserves for the Tec 10 well as estimated by Reserve Engineers at December 31, 2021 and adjusted for production in each interim period
Less: accumulated depletion beginning of period
